title: The Westward movement: an instructional sound film
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and ERPI Classroom Films
brief_description: Shows he westward movement in the USA, how pioneers started to immigrate westward. Quite an informative documentary, great for classroom education on the topic.
